summary: this mod adds the facial markings of the jaffa from the tv series Stargate SG-1. Racemenu by expired required.
descriptionHtml:
this mod will add several of the forehead markings used by the Jaffa to identify which god they served. i added the Origin symbol too because i liked it.

These are NOT the gold plated markings used by the First Primes. i have no modeling knowledge so i cannot make those. however you can use racemenu to make the tattoos gold if you want.

Adds 24 overlays total, 12 for each gender. overlays are not designed for forehead lumpyness so if your characters forehead is bulgy your kind of SOL.

List of symbols: Anubis
                        Apophis
                        Aries
                        Ba'al
                        Cronus
                        Hathor
                        Manannan Mac Lir
                        Moloc
                        Origin
                        Ra
                        Sokar
                        Yu 

if anybody wants more of these just submit an image here and i will add it to the mod.

I am looking for good tribal like symbols for the 8 and 1 and the daedric princes so if anybody has any of those let me know.

    INSTALLATION

Activate with NMM
-or-
Drop the esp, scripts and textures folder into your data folder and merge them with the folders already there.


Credits
